about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Odyssey Times, a retro-inspired JRPG that combines the charm of classic SNES-era games with a modern twist. Crafted with love for games like Final Fantasy and Undertale, this game takes you on an epic journey filled with emotion and strategy!

 

A Story-Driven Adventure
In Odyssey Times, you’ll embark on a captivating quest filled with rich characters, mysterious lands, and dark forces threatening the world. This game attempts to capture the spirit of the 16-bit JRPGs you know and love - while adding fresh mechanics that push the genre forward. Battle enemies with a dynamic combat system, explore beautifully crafted pixel landscapes, and solve puzzles as you unravel the narrative.

 

Stunning Pixel Art and Soundtrack
Immerse yourself in the handcrafted pixel art that calls back to the golden age of RPGs by AAA and PixelBoy.
Complementing the visuals is an epic soundtrack carrying you through the highs and lows of your journey made by Haberchuck.

(Check out their amazing stuff on itch!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU with 128 MB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a story-driven adventure where dynamic combat and leveling meet the charm of a SNES-era JRPG.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish
